Compliance & Regulations

SecureTickets operates in full compliance with financial regulations, data protection laws, and industry standards to ensure a safe and legal marketplace.

Regulatory Compliance

Meeting the highest standards across all jurisdictions

Financial Regulations

Compliant with FinCEN, BSA, and anti-money laundering regulations for financial services.

• Money Services Business (MSB) Registration

• Bank Secrecy Act Compliance

• Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Program

Data Protection

Full compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulations worldwide.

• GDPR Article 25 - Privacy by Design

• CCPA Consumer Rights Protection

• Data Processing Impact Assessments

Payment Card Industry

PCI DSS Level 1 compliance for secure payment processing and data handling.

• PCI DSS Level 1 Certification

• Secure Payment Processing

• Regular Security Assessments

Legal Framework

Jurisdictional Compliance

SecureTickets operates in compliance with applicable laws in all jurisdictions where we provide services, including but not limited to:

United States

  • • Federal Trade Commission Act
  • • Electronic Fund Transfer Act
  • • Fair Credit Reporting Act
  • • State consumer protection laws

European Union

  • • General Data Protection Regulation
  • • Payment Services Directive 2
  • • Consumer Rights Directive
  • • Digital Services Act

Reporting & Transparency

We maintain transparent reporting practices and cooperate with regulatory authorities:

  • • Regular compliance reports to regulatory bodies
  • • Suspicious activity reporting (SAR) when required
  • • Customer transaction reporting (CTR) compliance
  • • Annual compliance attestations
